sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Computes the inverse hyperbolic sine of its argument. The general syntax for its use is y = asinh(x) where x is an n-dimensional array of numerical type.

sect1.title: Internals
sect1.para: The asinh function is computed from the formula \[ \sinh^{-1}(x) = \log\left(x + (x^2 + 1)^0.5\right) \] where the log (and square root) is taken in its most general sense.
